001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
007
008import java.util.List;
009
010@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
011public interface BasisFunction<N extends Number> extends NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
012
013    N apply(N input);
014
015    interface Generator<N extends Number> extends NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
016
017        FeatureExtractor<N> generate(int featureCount);
018
019    }
020
021    @Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
022    class FeatureExtractor<N extends Number> implements net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureExtractor<N> {
023
024        private final List<BasisFunction<N>> basis;
025        private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
026
027        public FeatureExtractor(List<BasisFunction<N>> basis, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
028            this.basis = basis;
029            this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
030        }
031
032        @Override
033        public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getTypeSupport() {
034            return typeSupport;
035        }
036
037        /**
038         * {@inheritDoc}
039         */
040        public Array<N> extractFeatures(N input) {
041            int m = basis.size();
042            Array<N> features = typeSupport.createArray(m);
043            for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
044                features.set(i, basis.get(i).apply(input));
045            }
046            return features;
047        }
048
049        /**
050         * {@inheritDoc}
051         */
052        public int featureCount() {
053            return basis.size();
054        }
055
056    }
057}
